body: Kuroba dam: I'm playing in both sides, so I always come off on the top

Doesn't matter if it is parallel universe or not, the point is why the original author made NTR doujin of this girl? It ruined her image.
The author for this is based as fuck for doing a dual manga/doujin project. It was hard to fap to this though since I just read the manga this morning. Yankee girl is sweet and charming to a Tee.

i don't see the NTR the girl is single in the manga and the MC is so lame, i see them more like friends than a couple.
But in all honesty the author is trying to just trying cash out on autists, don't support this type of shit.
The old bait and switch

This even has the main guy for the the manga on page 6. Author was promoting this doujin beside  the regular manga which I find crazy. Trying to sell a manga as wholesome fluff with a tough girl motivating a boy while getting closer. But at the same time, heavily promoting, essentially a NTR doujin with the same girl, in the same universe, and in the same damn classroom is hilarious too me.
